      • getCoordinate

        public static Coordinate getCoordinate​(char file,
                                       int row)
                                throws BadInputException
        Get coordinate of the grid
        Parameters:
        file - File or column used to get x value
        row - Row used to get y value
        Returns:
        The requested coordinate
        Throws:
        BadInputException - If file or row doesn't exist

      • getCoordinate

        public static Coordinate getCoordinate​(java.lang.String fileRank)
                                throws BadInputException
        Get a coordinate of the grids
        Parameters:
        fileRank - A string that contains the file at the first char and rank at the second
        Returns:
        The requested coordinate
        Throws:
        BadInputException - If the requested coordinate doesn't exist

      • isInBoard

        public static boolean isInBoard​(Coordinate c)
        Parameters:
        c - Coordinate to check it it is in the board
        Returns:
        True if it is in the board, false otherwise

      • isPathClear

        public static boolean isPathClear​(java.util.List<Square> path)
        Parameters:
        path - List of squares that represent a path from the first element to the last element
        Returns:
        True if all squares in between don't have a piece, false otherwise

        Get a square from the board
        Parameters:
        c - The coordinate of the requested square
        Returns:
        The requested square

      • getSquare

        public Square getSquare​(char file,
                        int row)
                 throws BadInputException
        Get a square from the board
        Parameters:
        file - File or column where the square is located
        row - Row where the square is located
        Returns:
        The requested square
        Throws:
        BadInputException - If file or row doesn't exist

      • getSquare

        public Square getSquare​(java.lang.String fileRank)
                 throws BadInputException
        Get a square from the board
        Parameters:
        fileRank - A string that contains the file at the first char and rank at the second
        Returns:
        The requested square
        Throws:
        BadInputException - If the requested square doesn't exist

      • isSafe

        public boolean isSafe​(Square square,
                      Color color)
        Check if square is safe from the opposing color
        Parameters:
        square - The square to check for safety
        color - The color of the hypothetical piece that would be on square. Basically checks if any of the pieces of the opposite color can attack this square.
        Returns:
        True if square is safe, false otherwise

      • isEverySquare

        public boolean isEverySquare​(java.util.function.Predicate<Square> predicate)
        Checks if predicate returns true for every square in the board
        Parameters:
        predicate - Predicate that will be passed every square in the board
        Returns:
        True if all squares pass test, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        ASCII representation of how the board looks
